extendedInfo.description: This is a small app that hopefully help you if your baby or child won't sleep. It consist's of 6 sounds,which according to scientific studies to soothe babies and all who just want to try it out, to sleep.Ability to play all the sounds at the same time and combine different sound with each other. Find your favorite sound.- Easy to use user interface- 15 Minutes Sleep Timer with Autostart- 6 different Sounds- Play different Sounds at once- Find your favorite SoundcombinationIt consists of- At the river- Hairdryer- Heartbeat- On the road- At the beach- Watertap

reviews.comment: Simple but poorly executed. Gaps in sound loops, no menu (hence no mixing) and wildly varied volume levels between sounds. Not ready for market yet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: meh
reviews.comment: Simple, and clean but the sounds loops are way too short (5-10 seconds) and they don\'t loop smoothly.
reviews.author: A Google User
